titulo: Flagship-pilot: large-scale demonstrations of CCAM (CCAM Partnership)
descricao: Expected Outcome:This flagship pilot is the culmination of the entire activity catalogue carried out by the CCAM Partnership since its launch in 2021. It will combine in one project the most promising CCAM use-cases across three key domains, with the technological advancements from all its R&I clusters[1] supporting and enabling CCAM systems and services towards market uptake.This action is expected to contribute to all the following outcomes:Large-scale demonstrations of inclusive, user-oriente
